title: Did Trump Call USPS ‘Most Corrupt and Anti-American Way of Voting’?
subtitle: The U.S. president has expressed many (and varied) feelings about mail-in voting.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump said on "Sean Hannity Radio" that the United States Postal Service is the most "anti-American" way to vote, and that he would try and dismantle it.
